name: PHILLY Buffalo Chicken Dip
author: Philadelphia
summary: This tasty appetizer takes only 12 minutes to prepare and is perfect for last minute entertaining. Guests are sure to love the modern twist on classic buffalo wings.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened
1 (6 ounce) package OSCAR MAYER Deli Fresh Oven Roasted Chicken Breast Cuts
½ cup hot pepper sauce for Buffalo wings
¼ cup KRAFT Natural Blue Cheese Crumbles
directions: Spread cream cheese onto bottom of microwaveable 9-inch pie plate
Mix chicken and sauce; spoon over cream cheese
Top with blue cheese and onions
Serve warm with celery sticks and WHEAT THINS Original Crackers
